original_title: Bronx: City Island Road - Tier Street
text:
(1)
Pelham Bay Park: A view of the Marshall Mansion, on the north side of City Island Road, about three hundred yards west of City Island Bridge. The house is still standing at this date (1937), but is unoccupied.
1910.
Gift of Randall Comfort.
(2)
The same, at a later date.
May 29, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

original_title: Bronx: City Island Road - Tier Street
text:
Pelham Bay Park: A front view of the Marshall Mansion, on the north side of City Island Road, about 300 yards west of City Island Bridge. It is situated on the former L.R. Marshall estate and is still standing at this date (1937).

June 1926.

Brown Brothers.
